content:
At GMBM LTD, we have developed a patented solution that addresses two major challenges in the industry: congestion in seaports and the rising cost and scarcity of real estate. Our innovative technology is cost-effective, efficient, and has the potential to revolutionize the industry. We have a clear plan of action in place and the expertise to implement it, making our solution a viable and realistic one.

Our patented technology involves the construction of sea rafts using inside-concreted bottoms of shipping containers, which are capable of movement on both water and land. These rafts can also be connected to each other to form an array of rafts with power lift adaptability for various purposes. The rafts also feature hydraulic freight and passenger elevators that allow them to rise and lower from the platform.

At GMBM LTD, we are
